7.post_text:
When style, elegance, and technology come together, the result is nothing but powerful. 

Now, you can experience it for yourself from our fleet of BMW 3 Series and BMW 5 Series Programme Cars and enjoy up to $21,000 off* on limited units, as well as exclusive giveaways, including a Complimentary Solar Film* and BMW Service Inclusive for 5 years*. 

What’s more, you can also go for the sportier version of the BMW 5 Series, the BMW 5 Series Edition Sport Pro Plus.  

Visit us or call Performance Motors at 6653 8052 today, or catch us at our roadshow from now to 17 July 2016 at Millenia Walk, The Great Hall, to find out more about exclusive deals.
